metadata.title: CVE-2021-29964 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A locally-installed hostile program could send `WM_COPYDATA` messages that Firefox would process incorrectly, leading to an out-of-bounds read. *This bug only affects Firefox on Windows. Other operating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 78.11, Firefox < 89, and Firefox ESR < 78.11.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine mdeslaur> only affects thunderbird on windows

criterions.comment: mozjs78 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
